sentences.en: Among the many regulatory substances in use we have controllable and selective herbicides.
sentences.cn: 在所有的许多调节物质中,有控制性的和选择性的除草剂.

sentences.en: I intend to urge him to bring pressure on all regulatory agencies to move swiftly.
sentences.cn: 我要督促他对所有制定规章的机构施加压力,叫他们动作快点.

sentences.en: In theory, regulatory negotiation can provide a superior format for encouraging cooperation rather than confrontation.
sentences.cn: 在理论上, 管理式谈判能够提供优越的形式鼓励合作而非对抗.

sentences.en: Man must also assume the work involved in many of these regulatory processes.
sentences.cn: 人还必须担负起这种调节过程所包括的许多工作.

sentences.en: Moreover, much of the work of the regulatory agencies takes place outside of formal proceedings.
sentences.cn: 此外, 大多数管理机关的工作发生于正式诉讼之外.

sentences.en: Nuclear Information and Resource Service v. Nuclear Regulatory Commission, 918 F .2 d 189, 190 ( D . C . Cir.1990 ).
sentences.cn: 见“核信息和资源服务诉核监视委员会”[1990年《联邦判例汇编》第918卷第189 、 190页 ( 地区法院巡回法庭 ) ].

sentences.en: Partially, that has to do with our regulatory framework, which is built on the idea that medicine is all about disease.
sentences.cn: 部分原因跟我们的监管架构有关。 这个架构建立在药物全是用来治病的理念之下。

sentences.en: Perhaps the best reason for regulators to be suspicious about innovation is that so much of it in the modern world is aimed at facilitating regulatory and tax arbitrage.
sentences.cn: 监管者之所以对创新怀有疑虑，最关键的原因可能在于，现代社会中太多创新的目的都是为监管和税收套利提供便利。

sentences.en: Pneumatic valves regulate the pneumatic enforcement agencies and regulatory valves two.
sentences.cn: 气动调节阀由气动执行机构和调节阀两部组成.

sentences.en: Regulatory commission should not fall into the trap.
sentences.cn: 管理委员会不应陷入圈套之中.

sentences.en: Regulatory commissions concern themselves with the quantity and quality of service that is rendered by firms.
sentences.cn: 管理委员会还关心厂商提供的服务的数量和质量.

sentences.en: Single - mission agencies do not always have the answers to complex regulatory problems. "
sentences.cn: 单一职能的机关并非始终可以解决复杂的管理问题.

sentences.en: Some regulatory procedures governing S & Ls'capital requirements were also liberalized.
sentences.cn: 对 储贷 社资金标准的某些限制也放宽了.

sentences.en: Special emphasis is given to the consideration of economic and technological feasibility in a regulatory system.
sentences.cn: 对管理体系中的经济与技术可行性,本章给予特别的强调.

sentences.en: That cell hybridization can be used to dissect regulatory mechanisms controlling gene expression in eukaryotic cells.
sentences.cn: 杂交细胞能被应用于剖析真核细胞中控制基因表现的调节机理.

sentences.en: The operations of regulatory agencies are influenced by the executive, legislative and judicial branches of government.
sentences.cn: 调控机构的工作受到行政 、 立法,司法三大部门的影响.

sentences.en: Two notable regulatory changes resulted from enactment of Pub. L . 96 - 295.
sentences.cn: 在颁布的《公法》96—295条中,有两项改动引起人们的注意.

words.tran_cn: 调整；使有秩序；使合法化
调节，规定；控制；校准；有系统的管理

phrases.tran_cn: 中国银行业监督管理委员会
管理机构；制定规章的机构；执行机构
更好地处理控制请求；管理机构要求

trans.tran_cn: 调整的，具有监管权的，监管的
trans.tran_en: a regulatory authority has the official power to control an activity and to make sure that it is done in a satisfactory way
